revised_title: The Recovery of Ancient Jewish Weights and Measures
tldr: The author, Richard Cumberland, presents a comprehensive study on the recovery of ancient Jewish weights and measures, comparing them with ancient standards and modern measurements. He focuses on the Egyptian Cubit and its relation to the Jewish Cubit, as well as the Epha and other measures of capacity. Cumberland also discusses the weights and coins mentioned in Scripture and proposes a universal standard based on the length of a pendulum.
